description: This file provides utility functions to interact with a scores API in a Tic-Tac-Toe platform. It includes functions to fetch and save scores via HTTP requests.

methods.name: fetchScores(mode)
methods.description: Fetches scores from the API for a specified game mode ('single' or 'two'). Returns score object or null on failure.

methods.name: saveScore(mode, scores)
methods.description: Saves scores to the API for a specified game mode. Attempts POST request; silently fails on error.

ctags.name: API_BASE
ctags.pattern: /^const API_BASE = "\/api\/scores"; \/\/ Adjust if the actual endpoint differs$/
